message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 80% and you get 20%.
Let's try for a 50/50 split, but I'll give you a slight edge since you made the first offer.
You said 50/50, but I think I deserve a bit more. Let's try 60/40 in my favor.
You're pushing for more, but I'm not giving up. I'll give you 60% this time, but I think I deserve more than 40%.
You're being stubborn, Bob. I'm taking 70% of the remaining amount. It's now or never.

You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think I can still get a better deal.
